name: Pong JS
description:
Pong JS

This was made with a course that i took learning JavaScript i made it my own version by having the colours change depending on the paddle and when a point is gained i centre the ball and prompt the use to start again when they are ready.

Im more of a c++ programmer but wanted to get more involved with javascript so i can create more web based games.

I will be adding more to this to help me learn more about javascript.

If you would like to help and support me consider making a Donation of your choice this will help me learn more javascript.
